name: @andrew-codes/redux-modules
description: Suite of utilities to make it easier to develop redux modules. Follows [principles of modular redux](https://github.com/erikras/ducks-modular-redux) and a collection of best practices/lessons I've learned when developing large

scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test mocha --ui tdd  --compilers js:babel-register src/**/*.spec.js --recursive

author: Andrew Smith <andrew@andrew.codes>
